description: This data set includes general demographics for all persons who hold, or have recently held a: Driver License, Permit or Non-Driver Identification Card (a.k.a. credential) issued by the New York State Department of Motor Vehicles.

name: Driver License, Permit, and Non-Driver Identification Cards Issued
